about_the_game:
START AGAIN START AGAIN START AGAIN: a prologue (an artbook) (or: the artbook) is an artbook for the game START AGAIN START AGAIN START AGAIN: a prologue. 39 pages of concept art and wips and lil character facts!!! Wow!!!!!!!

(The artbook contains spoilers, so I recommend playing START AGAIN: a prologue until you see the True Ending! Or don't, I'm not your parent)

✨ To find the artbook when you've bought it, find START AGAIN: a prologue in your Steam Library, right click, go to Local Files, Browse, and you should find the PDF there! ✨

If you still can't find it, you might need to change the game's language. Go to your Steam Library, right click the game, and change the game's language to English, and the artbook should now be in your Local Files. You can revert the language then!
detailed_description:
START AGAIN START AGAIN START AGAIN: a prologue (an artbook) (or: the artbook) is an artbook for the game START AGAIN START AGAIN START AGAIN: a prologue. 39 pages of concept art and wips and lil character facts!!! Wow!!!!!!!

(The artbook contains spoilers, so I recommend playing START AGAIN: a prologue until you see the True Ending! Or don't, I'm not your parent)

✨ To find the artbook when you've bought it, find START AGAIN: a prologue in your Steam Library, right click, go to Local Files, Browse, and you should find the PDF there! ✨

If you still can't find it, you might need to change the game's language. Go to your Steam Library, right click the game, and change the game's language to English, and the artbook should now be in your Local Files. You can revert the language then!
